price: 26. A Él pertenece cuanto hay en los cielos y en la tierra, y todo Lo obedece.
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
